navigation.name: Etienne Deneault
navigation.description: React Portifolio built using a template designed by Brian Tran, friend/fellow software engineer. I used the project template to test the workflow and provide feedback.  I also made significant modifications to suit my needs. ( e.g. this modal!)

main.blurb: I am a Software Engineer with experience in building web applications and providing product-based solutions that are well-planned and deliver performant applications for all of the stakeholders. I thrive when working in teams that are motivated and are passionate about delivering the best possible products.  I strive to be a lifelong student and teacher.

projects.description: Designed as Capstone project for the SpringBoard Software Engineering Bootcamp, GYM HERO is a lightweight Athlete Management Web Application.
Web Game built using dynamic javascript.  Programmed in OOP.  Features include: Computer Player for solo play, local storage to persist scoreboard values, color picker for player tokens.

Foreign Currency Converter is a Flask-jinja template driven application providing currency conversion features.  Features include currency conversion, historical currency variation data with a javascript build graphical representation and estimated conversion rates with fees.
"A BBQ transformation into a planter box, remixed with a Raspberry Pi based environmental monitoring and plant watering system."

addProjects.description: Marvel themed memory game using dynamic vanila javascript.
Jeopardy trivia game using javascript to dynamically generate html. Game uses API jService for question data.

about.statement1: I am a Software Engineer with experience in building web applications and providing product-based solutions that are well-planned and deliver performant applications for all of the stakeholders. I thrive when working in teams that are motivated and are passionate about delivering the best possible product.
about.statement2: Over the last 10 years, I have had success in implementing solutions that provide meaningful data to high performance environments such as Cirque du Soleil. I was part of a team that supported the integration of an athlete/artist management system and helped to develop a platform consisting of a dashboard with relevant medical/performance data.
about.statement3: I am interested in a position within a progressive company in the tech industry that is dynamic, multi-cultural and stimulating. I bring a positive attitude and the ability to take complex problems and design thoughtful solutions.

work.position: Lead Manager - Head Coach of Acrobatics
work.description: Successfully led teams of 65+ employees in daily operations. Subject matter expert in the development of a dashboard to analyze and view aggregate performance data of athletes and deployed a customized athlete management system. Implemented development programs to secure a pipeline of qualified future coaches.

Directed day to day operations, participated in the production design workflow and led project teams. IMAGO focused on  providing sophisticated acrobatic acts, full- length productions and development, technical services, production staffing and event logistics. Participated in over 500 events and tours with Imago.

items.name: SPRINGBOARD
items.description: 700+ hours of hands-on course material, with 1:1 industry expert mentor oversight, and completion of 4 in-depth portfolio projects. Mastered skills in front-endweb development, back-end web development, databases, and data structures and algorithms.

items.name: Front-End Web UI Frameworks and Tools: Bootstrap 4 with Honors
Introduction to Structured Query Language SQL

image.description: "Software Engineers can help shape positive results in the real world"
